title: Estimated time for merch arrival?
body:
Hey guys! 
So I've recently purchased the gnar {{champion:150}} and hiem {{champion:74}}bundle and was wondering what the estimated time of the arrival is? It has been 4 business days, and it's still processing...  My friend told me he got his cho and kog Maw ones in about just over a week... It has almost been a week, and hasn't even been shipped yet. How long did your merch take when  you bought stuff? Please riot, I want my two figures before christmas! 

Comment below please, as always, I love reading  them...

Thanks 
(P.S, Live in Australia)

replies.body: In the past I've ordered a mousepad and figures, and in my experience they took about 2 - 3 weeks to get here. Personally I don't expect my own order to arrive before Christmas, but legit hope all of it works out in time for you.
Thanks bro, just got a message today saying that they are on there way... Hopefully they get here in time!
